vlive.korean: 그럼 네가 꿰매주기까지 해? You are going to do the sewing? 듣기 View video Dispatch : [ⓓxV] “SVT 선물” (세븐틴:SEVENTEEN)
vlive.english: You are going to do the sewing?

vlive.korean: 입을 꿰매버릴까보다 진짜! Why I ought to sew your mouth shut! 듣기 View video 모비딕(Mobidic) : <쎈마이웨이> 지지리 궁상떠는 짠돌이 남친
vlive.english: Why I ought to sew your mouth shut!

vlive.korean: 예쁘게 잘 꿰 매 주셨어요. He stitched it nicely. 듣기 View video Park Bo Young : 연~락
줄로 한 번 꿰매봐요. Let's string the beads. 듣기 View video IDOL x IDOL : Various - 베리어스 '주고 싶은 게 있으니까 들어와'
"LINA 바지 꿰매주고 싶어요". "I want to sew up LINA's pants". 듣기 View video IDOL x IDOL : 언타이틀 - '워너비와 함께하는 언타이틀'
vlive.english: "I want to sew up LINA's pants".

examples.korean: Surgeons were able to sew the finger back on. 듣기 Add to Wordbook (외과) 의사들이 그 손가락을 다시 꿰매 붙일[봉합할] 수가 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Surgeons were able to sew the finger back on. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Can you sew my shirt? 듣기 Add to Wordbook 내 셔츠 꿰매 줄 수 있나요? YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Can you sew my shirt? Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She tacked a ribbon onto her hat. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 모자에 리본을 꿰매 달았다. Dong-a's Prime English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She tacked a ribbon onto her hat. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I'll have this hole sewed up tomorrow. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 내일 이 구멍을 꿰매 주시오. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: These shirts are ripped. I'd like to have them sewn up. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이 셔츠가 찢어졌는데, 꿰매 주세요. Neungyule
